betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Most AE2 facades are hidden in §2JEI§r to prevent clutter, but they still exist!

To craft them, place any solid block surrounded by 4 §aCable Anchors§r. These work with AE2 parts to cover things up.

§eAny§r facade wil do. I simply decided to add the magic hazard for fun.


GregTech also has its own facades, crafted with a solid block and an §aIron Plate§r. They work as covers and can be placed on machines and pipes.
